title:
House Hearing, 93rd Congress
									
								 - To create the American Film Institute as an independent agency: hearings before the Select Subcommittee on Education of the Committee on Education and Labor, House of Representatives, Ninety-third Congress, second session, on H.R. 17021 a bill to amend the National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Act of 1965 to create the American Film Institute as an independent agency, October 7 and 8, 1974.
